verses.verse: Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> the first-born of Israel <S%H3478><s%> (for he was the first-born, but because he defiled <S%H2490><s%> his father's bed, <S%H3326><s%> his birthright <S%H1062><s%> was given <S%H5414><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> so that he is not enrolled <S%H3187><s%> in the genealogy <S%H3187><s%> according to the birthright. <S%H1062><s%>

Though <S%H3588><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> over his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and from him [came] the leader, <S%H5057><s%> yet the birthright <S%H1062><s%> belonged to Joseph <S%H3130><s%>),
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> the first-born of Israel <S%H3478><s%> [were] Hanoch <S%H2585><s%> and Pallu, <S%H6396><s%> Hezron <S%H2696><s%> and Carmi. <S%H3756><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joel <S%H3100><s%> [were] Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Gog <S%H1463><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Shimei <S%H8096><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Micah <S%H4318><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Reaiah <S%H7211><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Baal <S%H9058><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>

Beerah <S%H880><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Tilgath-pilneser king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> carried <S%H1540><s%> away <S%H1540><s%> into exile; <S%H1540><s%> he was leader <S%H5387><s%> of the Reubenites. <S%H7206><s%>

And his kinsmen <S%H251><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> in the genealogy <S%H3187><s%> of their generations, <S%H8435><s%> [were] Jeiel <S%H3262><s%> the chief, <S%H7218><s%> then Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>

and Bela <S%H1106><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azaz, <S%H5811><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shema, <S%H8087><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joel, <S%H3100><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> even to Nebo <S%H5015><s%> and Baal-meon.

And to the east <S%H4217><s%> he settled <S%H3427><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the entrance <S%H935><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> from the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates, <S%H6578><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> their cattle <S%H4735><s%> had increased <S%H7235><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

And in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> they made <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> with the Hagrites, <S%H1905><s%> who fell <S%H5307><s%> by their hand, <S%H3027><s%> so that they occupied <S%H3427><s%> their tents <S%H168><s%> throughout <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H6440><s%> east <S%H4217><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>
Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> opposite <S%H5048><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Salecah. <S%H5548><s%>
Joel <S%H3100><s%> [was] the chief, <S%H7218><s%> and Shapham <S%H8223><s%> the second, <S%H4932><s%> then Janai <S%H3285><s%> and Shaphat <S%H8202><s%> in Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

And their kinsmen <S%H251><s%> of their fathers' households <S%H1004><s%> [were] Michael, <S%H4317><s%> Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> Sheba, <S%H7652><s%> Jorai, <S%H3140><s%> Jacan, <S%H3275><s%> Zia, <S%H2127><s%> and Eber, <S%H5677><s%> seven. <S%H7651><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Abihail, <S%H32><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Huri, <S%H2359><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jaroah, <S%H3386><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michael, <S%H4317><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshishai, <S%H3454><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jahdo, <S%H3163><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Buz; <S%H938><s%>
Ahi <S%H277><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abdiel, <S%H5661><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Guni, <S%H1476><s%> [was] head <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers' households. <S%H1004><s%>

And they lived <S%H3427><s%> in Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%> and in its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> of Sharon, <S%H8289><s%> as far <S%H5921><s%> as their borders. <S%H8444><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> of these were enrolled <S%H3187><s%> in the genealogies <S%H3187><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jotham <S%H3147><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> and the half-tribe of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> [consisting] of valiant <S%H2428><s%> men, <S%H1121><s%> men <S%H376><s%> who bore <S%H5375><s%> shield <S%H4043><s%> and sword <S%H2719><s%> and shot <S%H1869><s%> with bow, <S%H7198><s%> and [were] skillful <S%H3925><s%> in battle, <S%H4421><s%> [were] 44760, who went <S%H3318><s%> to war. <S%H6635><s%>
And they made <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the Hagrites, <S%H1905><s%> Jetur, <S%H3195><s%> Naphish, <S%H5305><s%> and Nodab. <S%H5114><s%>

And they were helped <S%H5826><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them, and the Hagrites <S%H1905><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> who [were] with them were given <S%H5414><s%> into their hand; <S%H3027><s%> for they cried <S%H2199><s%> out to God <S%H430><s%> in the battle, <S%H4421><s%> and He was entreated <S%H6279><s%> for them, because <S%H3588><s%> they trusted <S%H982><s%> in Him.

And they took <S%H7617><s%> away <S%H7617><s%> their cattle: <S%H4735><s%> their 50000 camels, <S%H1581><s%> 250000 sheep, <S%H6629><s%> 2000 donkeys, <S%H2543><s%> and 100000 men. <S%H5315><s%> <S%H120><s%>

For many <S%H7227><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> slain, <S%H2491><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the war <S%H4421><s%> [was] of God. <S%H430><s%> And they settled <S%H3427><s%> in their place <S%H8478><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the exile. <S%H1473><s%>

Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the half-tribe of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land; <S%H776><s%> from Bashan <S%H1316><s%> to Baal-hermon <S%H2768><s%> and Senir <S%H8149><s%> and Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon they were numerous. <S%H7235><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> were the heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> even Epher, <S%H6081><s%> Ishi, <S%H3469><s%> Eliel, <S%H447><s%> Azriel, <S%H5837><s%> Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> Hodaviah, <S%H1938><s%> and Jahdiel, <S%H3164><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> famous <S%H8034><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers' households. <S%H1004><s%>

But they acted <S%H4603><s%> treacherously <S%H4603><s%> against the God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers, and played <S%H1><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H2181><s%> the gods <S%H310><s%> of the peoples <S%H430><s%> of the land, <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H776><s%> God <S%H834><s%> had destroyed <S%H430><s%> before <S%H8045><s%> <S%H4480><s%> them.

So the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stirred <S%H5782><s%> up the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Pul, <S%H6322><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria, <S%H804><s%> even the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Tilgath-pilneser king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and he carried <S%H1540><s%> them away <S%H1540><s%> into exile, <S%H1540><s%> namely the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and the half-tribe of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them to Halah, <S%H2477><s%> Habor, <S%H2249><s%> Hara, <S%H2024><s%> and to the river <S%H5104><s%> of Gozan, <S%H1470><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
